name: @andreibratila/tailwind-utopia
description: A Tailwindcss v4 library for fluid typography and spacing with Utopia

scripts.postinstall: if [ "$npm_config_dev" != "true" ]; then echo '⚠️  It is recommended to install this package as a devDependency: npm install --save-dev @andreibratila/tailwind-utopia'; fi

author: Andrei Bratila
